preqs: A distinction level average in 24 points at third year level, including at least 12 points in 3rd year BMS units.

rules.ruleString: (Must be enrolled in course version {3418, 3976, M3004, M3702} and Any co-req unit in {BMS4100})

description: The unit aims to develop analytical abilities and communication skills, as well as provide students with advanced knowledge in specific areas of Biomedical Science. Students will undertake a module of statistics relevant to scientific hypothesis testing and provide a written critique of a scientific article. Students will also undertake a component of work within their selected discipline that is unrelated to their specific research component and involves some level of advanced theoretical training. Candidates may commence at the beginning of either first or second semester.
faculty: Faculty of Medicine, Nursing and Health Sciences
